#summary Testing the conversion process on revision 3

= Process =

Stage 1.

Create a 176.4kHz 32bit wav file in Matlab with a 1kHz tone at -3dBFs. I added 1/(2^24) peak amplitude of tpdf dither (i.e. equiv to the significant precision).

The fft spectrum of 1 sec of the data is shown below. This was computed in Matlab from the wav file.
